cards.name: Hurkyl's Recall
cards.text: Return all artifacts target player owns to their hand.

rulings.text: Retrieves all artifacts owned by the target player regardless of who controls them. Ignores artifacts owned by other players even if target player has control of them.
It only returns artifacts which are on the battlefield.

cards.name: Island Fish Jasconius
cards.text:
Island Fish Jasconius doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap Island Fish Jasconius.
Island Fish Jasconius can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Island Fish Jasconius.

rulings.text: Reworded so that it triggers only once at beginning of upkeep, instead of being an activated ability usable any time during your upkeep. You can no longer make infinite combos with this ability.

cards.name: Jump
cards.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: To work as an evasion ability, an attacking creature must already have flying when the declare blockers step begins. Once a creature has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

cards.name: Leviathan
cards.text:
Trample
Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

rulings.text: You don’t have to pay the untap cost if it is untapped outside the upkeep phase or is untapped by an effect.

cards.name: Lifetap
cards.text: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: Gives one life for each and every Forest tapped.
In multi-player games it affects all opponents.

cards.name: Lord of Atlantis
cards.text: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

cards.name: Magical Hack
cards.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

rulings.text: Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can’t change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.
You can’t change proper nouns (i.e. card names) such as “Island Fish Jasconius”.

Changing the text of a spell will not allow you to change the targets of the spell because the targets were chosen when the spell was cast. The text change will (probably) cause it to be countered since the targets will be illegal.
If you change the text of a spell which is to become a permanent, the permanent will retain the text change until the effect wears off.
It can be used to change a land’s type from one basic land type to another. For example, Forest can be changed to Island so it produces blue mana. It doesn’t change the name of any permanent.

cards.name: Mahamoti Djinn
cards.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.name: Mana Short
cards.text: Tap all lands target player controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

rulings.text: It even taps lands that do not produce mana.

Since this is an instant, your opponent may use instants in response to the casting of this spell. Note that such spells and abilities will be resolved before the mana pool is emptied by the Mana Short. This makes it useless as a countermeasure for spells. To use it effectively, you need to use it during Upkeep and even then it will not prevent the use of instant spells and abilities.
If you play Mana Short in response to a spell, it will have no effect on that spell since the mana has already been paid.

cards.name: Mind Bomb
cards.text: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards they discarded this way.

cards.name: Phantasmal Forces
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.

cards.name: Phantasmal Terrain
cards.text:
Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

rulings.text: Will not add or remove Snow Supertype to or from a land.

cards.name: Phantom Monster
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Pirate Ship
cards.text:
Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to any target.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

cards.name: Power Leak
cards.text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Power Leak deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

cards.name: Power Sink
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

cards.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
cards.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.name: Psionic Entity
cards.text: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself.

rulings.text: The artist is actually Justin Hampton.

cards.name: Psychic Venom
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

rulings.text: Whenever the land is tapped for any reason, the ability triggers.

cards.name: Relic Bind
cards.text:
Enchant artifact an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one —
• Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target player gains 1 life.

cards.name: Sea Serpent
cards.text:
Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.

cards.name: Segovian Leviathan
cards.text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

cards.name: Sindbad
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

rulings.text: If the draw is replaced by another effect, none of the rest of Sindbad’s ability applies, even if the draw is replaced by another draw (such as with Enduring Renewal).
To avoid confusion, reveal the card you draw before putting it with the rest of the cards in your hand.

cards.name: Siren's Call
cards.text:
Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared.
Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able.
At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

rulings.text: It will require creatures with Haste to attack since they are able, but it won’t destroy them if they don’t for some reason.
The creature is destroyed if it does not attack because it simply can’t do so legally.
This will destroy creatures that weren’t able to attack because they had been previously tapped.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can only be cast before the beginning of the Declare Attackers Step of the first combat phase in that turn.

cards.name: Sleight of Mind
cards.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

rulings.text: You can’t Sleight proper nouns (i.e. card names). This means that you can’t affect a “Black Vise”.
Can target a card with no color words on it.
Can’t change a color word to the same color word. It must be a different word.
Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can’t change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.

Changing the text of a spell will not allow you to change the targets of the spell because the targets were chosen when the spell was cast. The text change will (probably) cause it to be countered since the targets will be illegal.
If you change the text of a spell which is to become a permanent, the permanent will retain the text change until the effect wears off.

cards.name: Spell Blast
cards.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

rulings.text: Alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, and cost reductions don’t affect a spell’s converted mana cost.

If the target spell has {X} in its mana cost, include the value chosen for that X when determining the value of the {X} in Spell Blast’s mana cost. For example, if you wish to counter Volcanic Geyser (a spell with mana cost {X}{R}{R}) whose X is 7, you’ll need to choose 9 for Spell Blast’s X and pay {9}{U}.

cards.name: Stasis
cards.text:
Players skip their untap steps.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

rulings.text: Since there is no untap step, Phasing in/out won’t happen.
Does not prevent cards from being untapped outside the untap step.

cards.name: Steal Artifact
cards.text:
Enchant artifact
You control enchanted artifact.

rulings.text: Can be used on artifact creatures.

cards.name: Sunken City
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}.
Blue creatures get +1/+1.

cards.name: Thoughtlace
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes blue. (Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)

cards.name: Time Elemental
cards.text:
When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: You both sacrifice it and deal the 5 damage at end of combat.
A “permanent that isn’t enchanted” is a permanent with no Auras on it.
If Time Elemental attacks or blocks, but you no longer control it at end of combat, you can’t sacrifice it. However, it will still deal 5 damage to you.

cards.name: Twiddle
cards.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

rulings.text: This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.
The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.

cards.name: Unstable Mutation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

rulings.text: The -1/-1 counters stay even if the Aura is removed, and the +3/+3 goes away when the Aura does.

cards.name: Unsummon
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Volcanic Eruption
cards.text: Destroy X target Mountains. Volcanic Eruption deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of Mountains put into a graveyard this way.

rulings.text: Can be used with X equal to zero. This is useful if no Mountains are on the battlefield.

cards.name: Wall of Air
cards.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)

cards.name: Wall of Water
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}: Wall of Water gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Zephyr Falcon
cards.text: Flying, vigilance

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

foreignNames.name: Luftelementar
foreignNames.text: Kann fliegen

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Animate Artifact
cards.text:
Enchant artifact
As long as enchanted artifact isn't a creature, it's an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

rulings.text: This card has been returned to its original functionality. If it is enchanting an artifact that’s already a creature, it won’t change its power and toughness.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

foreignNames.name: Artefaktbelebung
foreignNames.text: Das verzauberte Nicht-Kreatur-Artefakt wird zu einer Artefaktkreatur mit sowohl Stärke als auch Widerstandskraft in Höhe der Spruchkosten des Artefakts. Es behält allerdings alle seine Originaleigenschaften.

cards.originalText: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its casting cost; target retains all its original abilities. Animate Artifact does not affect artifact creatures.

cards.name: Apprentice Wizard

foreignNames.name: Zauberlehrling
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um 3 farblose Mana. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber

cards.originalText: oU, ocT: Add o3 to your mana pool. Play this ability as an interrupt.

cards.name: Backfire
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, Backfire deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

foreignNames.name: Gegenfeuer
foreignNames.text: Gegenfeuer fügt dem Beherrscher der verzauberten Kreatur für jeden Schadenspunkt, den die verzauberte Kreatur Dir zufügt, 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: Backfire deals 1 damage to target creature's controller for each 1 damage dealt to you by that creature.

cards.name: Blue Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can’t be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.

foreignNames.name: Blauer Urknall
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiert einen roten Zauberspruch oder zerstört eine rote Karte im Spiel.

cards.originalText: Counter target red spell or destroy target red permanent.

cards.name: Control Magic
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

rulings.text: Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

foreignNames.name: Kontrollzauber
foreignNames.text: Übernimm die Herrschaft über die verzauberte Kreatur.

cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.

foreignNames.name: Gegenzauber
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen gerade gespielten Zauberspruch.

cards.originalText: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Creature Bond
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, Creature Bond deals damage equal to that creature's toughness to the creature's controller.

foreignNames.name: Kreaturenbindung
foreignNames.text: Wenn das verzauberte Wesen auf dem Friedhof landet, fügt es durch die Bindung seinem Beherrscher Schaden in Höhe seiner Widerstandskraft zu.

cards.originalText: If target creature is put into the graveyard, Creature Bond deals damage equal to the creature's toughness to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Drain Power
cards.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

rulings.text: This card forces the target player to draw mana from lands if they are untapped, but that player can choose how to draw the mana if a land they control has multiple mana abilities, or mana abilities with choices.
Your opponent may use instants and abilities of permanents in response to this spell before you get the mana from their mana pool and lands.
If a land can draw a variable amount of mana, the target player (not the player of this spell) chooses how much to draw.
A mana ability is an ability that (1) isn’t a loyalty ability, (2) doesn’t target, and (3) could put mana into a player’s mana pool when it resolves.

foreignNames.name: Kraftsog
foreignNames.text: Dein Gegner muss alles Mana aus seinen verfügbaren Ländern produzieren. Dieses Mana und alles Mana, das er in seinem Manavorrat hat, fließt nun in Deinen Manavorrat.

cards.originalText: Target player must draw all mana from his or her available lands; then, all mana in target player's mana pool drains into your mana pool.

cards.name: Energy Flux
cards.text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

foreignNames.name: Energiefluktuation
foreignNames.text: Alle Artefakte erhalten die Eigenschaft: "Bezahle während Deiner Versorgungsphase zusätzlich 2 oder begrabe dieses Artefakt."

cards.originalText: During each player's upkeep, destroy all artifacts that player controls. The player may pay an additional o2 for each artifact he or she wishes to prevent Energy Flux from destroying.

cards.name: Energy Tap
cards.text: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's converted mana cost.

foreignNames.name: Energieanzapfung
foreignNames.text: Tappe eine Kreatur, die Du kontrollierst und erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um soviel farblose Mana, wie es kostet, diese Kreatur zu beschwören.

cards.originalText: Tap target creature you control. Add an amount of colorless mana equal to that creature's casting cost to your mana pool.

cards.name: Erosion
cards.text:
Enchant land
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, destroy that land unless that player pays {1} or 1 life.

foreignNames.name: Erosion
foreignNames.text: Während seiner Versorgungsphase muß der Beherrscher des verzauberten Landes 1 oder 1 Lebenspunkt zahlen, oder das Land wird zerstört. Effekte, die Schaden verhindern oder umleiten, können hier nicht angewendet werden, um den Verlust des Lebenspunktes zu verhindern.

cards.originalText: During his or her upkeep, target land's controller pays o1 or 1 life, or target land is destroyed. Effects that prevent or redirect damage cannot be used to counter this loss of life.

cards.name: Feedback
cards.text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, Feedback deals 1 damage to that player.

foreignNames.name: Rückkopplung
foreignNames.text: Während seiner Versorgungsphase fügt die Rückkopplung dem Beherrscher der verzauberten Verzauberung 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: Feedback deals 1 damage to controller of target enchantment during that player's upkeep.

cards.name: Flight
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

foreignNames.name: Flugfähigkeit
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur kann jetzt fliegen.

cards.originalText: Target creature gains flying.

cards.name: Flood
cards.text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
cards.flavor:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
—Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

foreignNames.name: Überflutung
foreignNames.text: {U}{U}: Tappe eine Kreatur ohne Flugfähigkeit.

cards.originalText: oUooU Tap target creature without flying.

cards.name: Gaseous Form
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
". . . [A]nd gives to airy nothing A local habitation and a name."
—William Shakespeare, A Midsummer-Night's Dream

rulings.text: The enchanted creature can still attack and block.

foreignNames.name: Gasförmigkeit
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur erleidet während eines Kampfes keinen Schaden, teilt aber auch keinen aus.

cards.originalText: Target creature neither deals nor receives damage during combat.

cards.name: Ghost Ship
cards.text:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.
cards.flavor:
"That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below."
—Mireille Gaetane, The Valeriad
cards.originalText:
Flying
oUoUooU Regenerate

cards.text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

foreignNames.text: Die Riesenschildkröte erhält +0/+3, solange sie nicht getappt ist.

cards.originalText: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 while untapped.

cards.name: Hurkyl's Recall
cards.text: Return all artifacts target player owns to their hand.
cards.flavor: This spell, like many attributed to Drafna, was actually the work of his wife and former student, Hurkyl.

rulings.text: Retrieves all artifacts owned by the target player regardless of who controls them. Ignores artifacts owned by other players even if target player has control of them.
It only returns artifacts which are on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Hurkyls Erinnerung
foreignNames.text: Der Spieler, gegen den dieser Spruch gespielt wird, muß alle seine im Spiel befindlichen Artefakte zurück auf seine Hand nehmen.

cards.originalText: All artifacts in play owned by target player are returned to that player's hand.

Island Fish Jasconius doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap Island Fish Jasconius.
Island Fish Jasconius can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Island Fish Jasconius.

rulings.text: Reworded so that it triggers only once at beginning of upkeep, instead of being an activated ability usable any time during your upkeep. You can no longer make infinite combos with this ability.

foreignNames.name: Inselfisch Jasconius
foreignNames.text:
Der Inselfisch enttappt nicht während Deiner Enttap-Phase.
Der Inselfisch kann nur angreifen, wenn der Gegner Inseln im Spiel hat. Wenn Du zu irgendeiner Zeit keine Inseln mehr im Spiel hast, geht Jasconius direkt auf den Friedhof.
{U}{U}{U}: Enttappe Inselfisch. Du kannst diese Eigenschaft nur während Deiner Versorgungsphase benutzen.

cards.originalText:
Does not untap during your untap phase.
Cannot attack if defending player controls no islands. If at any time you control no islands, bury Island Fish Jasconius.
oUoUooU Untap Island Fish. Use this ability only during your upkeep.

foreignNames.text: Die Zielkreatur kann bis zum Ende des Zuges fliegen.

Verursacht Trampelschaden
Der Leviathan kommt getappt ins Spiel und enttappt nicht während Deiner Entap-Phase.

foreignNames.name: Manamangel
foreignNames.text: Alle Länder des Gegners werden getappt und sein Manavorrat geleert.

cards.originalText: Mana Short empties target player's mana pool and taps that player's lands.

cards.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
cards.flavor: Most human scholars believe that Merfolk are the survivors of sunken Atlantis, humans adapted to the water. Merfolk, however, believe that humans sprang forth from Merfolk who adapted themselves in order to explore their last frontier.

foreignNames.name: Meervolk des Perlendreizacks
foreignNames.text: Viele Gelehrte glauben, die Angehörigen des Meervolks seien Überlebende des versunkenen Atlantis: Menschen, die sich dem Leben im Wasser angepasst hätten.

cards.name: Mind Bomb
cards.text: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards they discarded this way.

foreignNames.name: Erinnerungszerstörung
foreignNames.text: Die Erinnerungszerstörung fügt allen Spielern 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Jeder Spieler kann bis zu drei Karten abwerfen, um pro abgeworfener Karte einen dieser Schadenspunkte zu verhindern.

cards.originalText: Mind Bomb deals 3 damage to each player. All players may discard up to three cards of their choice from their hands. Each card a player discards in this manner prevents 1 damage to that player from Mind Bomb.

cards.name: Phantasmal Forces
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.
cards.flavor: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

foreignNames.name: Traumkrieger
foreignNames.text:
Können fliegen.
Zahle während Deiner Versorgungsphase {U} oder zerstöre die Traumkrieger.

cards.originalText:
Flying
During your upkeep, pay oU or destroy Phantasmal Forces.

cards.name: Phantasmal Terrain
cards.text:
Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

rulings.text: Will not add or remove Snow Supertype to or from a land.

foreignNames.name: Reich der Illusionen
foreignNames.text: Verzaubere ein Land in ein Standardland Deiner Wahl.

cards.originalText: Target land becomes any basic land type of your choice.

cards.name: Phantom Monster
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
"While, like a ghastly rapid river, Through the pale door, A hideous throng rush out forever, And laugh—but smile no more."
—Edgar Allan Poe, "The Haunted Palace"

foreignNames.name: Phantommonster
foreignNames.text: Fliegend

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Pirate Ship
cards.text:
Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to any target.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

foreignNames.name: Piratenschiff
foreignNames.text:
Das Piratenschiff kann nur angreifen, wenn der Gegner Inseln im Spiel hat. Wenn Du zu irgendeiner Zeit keine Inseln mehr im Spiel hast, begrabe das Piratenschiff.
{T}: Füge einem beliebigen Ziel 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText:
Cannot attack if defending player controls no islands. If at any time you control no islands, bury Pirate Ship.
ocT: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Power Leak
cards.text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Power Leak deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

foreignNames.name: Kraftleck
foreignNames.text: Während der Versorgungsphase des Beherrschers der verzauberten Verzauberung fügt das Kraftleck diesem 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Dieser Spieler kann 1 pro Schadenspunkt, den er vermeiden will, ausgeben, um sich vor dem Kraftleck zu schützen.

cards.originalText: During the upkeep of target enchantment's controller, Power Leak deals 2 damage to him or her. That player may pay o1 for each damage he or she wishes to prevent from Power Leak.

cards.name: Power Sink
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

foreignNames.name: Kraftverlust
foreignNames.text: Der Zeilspruch wird neutralisiert, wenn dessen Urheber nicht zusätzlich X ausgibt. Dieser Spieler muß alles verfügbare Mana aus seinem Manavorrat und seinen Ländern ausgeben, bis X bezahlt ist; wenn benötigt, kann er auch andere Manaquellen heranziehen.

cards.originalText: Counter a target spell if its caster does not pay oX. Target spell's caster must draw and pay all available mana from lands and mana pool until oX is paid; he or she may also pay mana from other sources if desired.

cards.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
cards.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Occasionally a member of the Institute of Arcane Study acquires a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

foreignNames.name: Abtrünniger Zauberer
foreignNames.text: {T}: Fügt einem beliebigen Ziel 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: ocT: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Psionic Entity
cards.text: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself.
cards.flavor: Creatures of the Æther are notorious for neglecting their own well-being.

rulings.text: The artist is actually Justin Hampton.

foreignNames.name: Psionische Einheit
foreignNames.text: {T}: Die Psionische Einheit fügt einem Ziel Deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte und sich selber 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: ocT: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to itself.

cards.name: Psychic Venom
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

rulings.text: Whenever the land is tapped for any reason, the ability triggers.

foreignNames.name: Seelengift
foreignNames.text: Wenn das verzauberte Land getappt wird, fügt das Seelengift dessen Beherrscher 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: Whenever target land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

cards.name: Relic Bind
cards.text:
Enchant artifact an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one —
• Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target player gains 1 life.

foreignNames.name: Reliktenbindung
foreignNames.text: Wenn das verzauberte Artefakt Deines Gegners getappt wird, kannst Du diesen Gegner einem Lebenspunkt geben oder mit Reliktenbindung einen Schadenspunkt zufügen.

cards.originalText: When target artifact opponent controls becomes tapped, you may give 1 life or have Relic Bind deal 1 damage to target player.

cards.name: Sea Serpent
cards.text:
Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.
cards.flavor: Legend has it that Serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

foreignNames.name: Seeschlange
foreignNames.text: Die Schlange kann nur angreifen, wenn der Gegner Inseln im Spiel hat. Wenn Du zu irgendeiner Zeit keine Inseln mehr im Spiel hast, geht die Schlange direkt auf den Friedhof.

cards.originalText: Cannot attack if defending player controls no islands. If at any time you control no islands, bury Sea Serpent.

cards.name: Segovian Leviathan
cards.text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
cards.flavor:
"Leviathan, too! Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?"
—Job 40:25
cards.originalText: Islandwalk

cards.name: Sindbad
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

rulings.text: If the draw is replaced by another effect, none of the rest of Sindbad’s ability applies, even if the draw is replaced by another draw (such as with Enduring Renewal).
To avoid confusion, reveal the card you draw before putting it with the rest of the cards in your hand.

foreignNames.name: Sindbad, der Seefahrer
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ziehe eine Karte. Wenn es kein Land ist, wirf sie sofort wieder ab.

cards.originalText: ocT: Draw a card. If it is not a land, discard it.

cards.name: Siren's Call
cards.text:
Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared.
Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able.
At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

rulings.text: It will require creatures with Haste to attack since they are able, but it won’t destroy them if they don’t for some reason.
The creature is destroyed if it does not attack because it simply can’t do so legally.
This will destroy creatures that weren’t able to attack because they had been previously tapped.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can only be cast before the beginning of the Declare Attackers Step of the first combat phase in that turn.

foreignNames.name: Lockruf der Sirenen
foreignNames.text: Sämtliche Kreaturen des Gegners, die angreifen können, müssen angreifen. Alle Kreaturen, die es nicht tun und keine Mauern sind, werden am Ende des Spielzuges vernichtet. Dieser Spontanzauber kann nur gespielt werden, wenn der Gegner am Zug ist, und nur vor seiner Angriffsphase. Kreaturen, die während dieser Runde heraufbeschworen wurden, bleiben vom Lockruf der Sirenen verschont.

cards.originalText: All of target opponent's creatures that can attack must do so. At end of turn, destroy any non-wall creatures that did not attack. Play only during opponent's turn, before opponent's attack. Siren's Call does not affect creatures brought under opponent's control this turn.

cards.name: Sleight of Mind
cards.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

rulings.text: You can’t Sleight proper nouns (i.e. card names). This means that you can’t affect a “Black Vise”.
Can target a card with no color words on it.
Can’t change a color word to the same color word. It must be a different word.
Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can’t change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.

Changing the text of a spell will not allow you to change the targets of the spell because the targets were chosen when the spell was cast. The text change will (probably) cause it to be countered since the targets will be illegal.
If you change the text of a spell which is to become a permanent, the permanent will retain the text change until the effect wears off.

foreignNames.name: Geniestreich
foreignNames.text: Ändere den Text eines Zielspruchs oder einer bleibenden Karte Deiner Wahl, indem Du eine Farbe durch eine andere ersetzt. Du kannst so z.B. "Neutralisiert roten Zauberspruch" durch "Neutralisiert schwarzen Zauberspruch" ersetzen. Die Manasymbole können durch den Geniestreich allerdings nicht vertauscht werden.

cards.originalText: Change the text of target spell or target permanent by replacing all occurrences of one color word with another. For example, you may change "Counters black spells" to "Counters blue spells." Sleight of Mind cannot change mana symbols.

cards.name: Spell Blast
cards.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

rulings.text: Alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, and cost reductions don’t affect a spell’s converted mana cost.

If the target spell has {X} in its mana cost, include the value chosen for that X when determining the value of the {X} in Spell Blast’s mana cost. For example, if you wish to counter Volcanic Geyser (a spell with mana cost {X}{R}{R}) whose X is 7, you’ll need to choose 9 for Spell Blast’s X and pay {9}{U}.

foreignNames.name: Zauberspruchexplosion
foreignNames.text: Der Zielzauber wird abgewehrt, wobei X für die Kosten des Zielzaubers steht.

cards.originalText: Counter target spell. X is the casting cost of the target spell.

cards.name: Stasis
cards.text:
Players skip their untap steps.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

rulings.text: Since there is no untap step, Phasing in/out won’t happen.
Does not prevent cards from being untapped outside the untap step.

foreignNames.name: Starre
foreignNames.text: Alle Spieler erhalten keine Enttap-Phase mehr. Bezahle {U} während Deiner Versorgungsphase oder vernichte die Starre.

cards.originalText: Players do not get an untap phase. During your upkeep, pay oU or destroy Stasis.

cards.name: Steal Artifact
cards.text:
Enchant artifact
You control enchanted artifact.

rulings.text: Can be used on artifact creatures.

cards.originalText: Gain control of target artifact.

cards.name: Sunken City
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}.
Blue creatures get +1/+1.

foreignNames.name: Versunkene Stadt
foreignNames.text:
Alle blauen Kreaturen erhalten +1/+1.
Zahle UU während Deiner Versorgungs-phase, oder die Versunkene Stadt wird zerstört.

cards.originalText: All blue creatures get +1/+1. During your upkeep, pay oUoU or destroy Sunken City.

cards.name: Thoughtlace
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes blue. (Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)

foreignNames.name: Gedankengewebe
foreignNames.text: Die Farbe einer entweder sich im Spiel befindlichen oder gerade gespielten Karte verändert sich in Blau. Völlig unberührt davon bleiben der Gebrauch einer bestimmten Fähigkeit und die Kosten des Zauberns, des Tappens oder der Versorgung des Ziels.

cards.originalText: Change the color of target spell or target permanent to blue. Costs to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target remain unchanged.

cards.name: Time Elemental
cards.text:
When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: You both sacrifice it and deal the 5 damage at end of combat.
A “permanent that isn’t enchanted” is a permanent with no Auras on it.
If Time Elemental attacks or blocks, but you no longer control it at end of combat, you can’t sacrifice it. However, it will still deal 5 damage to you.

foreignNames.name: Zeitelementar
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Der Beherrscher einer bleibenden Karte Deiner Wahl muß diese zurück in seine Hand nehmen. Diese Eigenschaft wirkt nicht gegen bleibende Karten, auf die Verzauberungen gesprochen wurden. Wenn das Zeitelementar blockt oder angreift, lege es am Ende der Runde auf dem Friedhof ab. Es fügt dann seinem Beherrscher 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: o2oUoU, ocT: Return target permanent to owner's hand. You cannot use this ability on permanents with enchantment cards played on them. If Time Elemental blocks or attacks, destroy it at end of combat. In this case, Time Elemental deals 5 damage to its controller.

cards.name: Twiddle
cards.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

rulings.text: This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.
The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.

foreignNames.name: Twiddel
foreignNames.text: Tappe oder enttappe ein Land, ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl.

foreignNames.name: Manipolatore
foreignNames.text: TAPpa o STAPpa una terra, un artefatto o una creatura bersaglio.

cards.originalText: Tap or untap target land, artifact, or creature.

cards.name: Unstable Mutation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

rulings.text: The -1/-1 counters stay even if the Aura is removed, and the +3/+3 goes away when the Aura does.

foreignNames.name: Instabile Mutation
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +3/+3. Während der Versorgungsphase ihres Beherrschers wird ein Spielstein mit -1/-1 auf die Kreatur gelegt. Diese Spielsteine bleiben auch dann im Spiel, wenn die Mutation entfernt wird.

cards.originalText: Target creature gets +3/+3. During each of its controller's upkeeps, put a -1/-1 counter on the creature. These counters remain even if Unstable Mutation is removed.

cards.name: Unsummon
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

foreignNames.name: Rückruf
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine im Spiel befindliche Kreatur auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

cards.originalText: Return target creature to owner's hand.

cards.name: Volcanic Eruption
cards.text: Destroy X target Mountains. Volcanic Eruption deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of Mountains put into a graveyard this way.

rulings.text: Can be used with X equal to zero. This is useful if no Mountains are on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Vulkanausbruch
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre X Gebirge Deiner Wahl. Der Vulkanausbruch fügt jedem Spieler und jeder Kreatur für jedes so vernichtete Gebirge einen Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: Destroy X target mountains. Volcanic Eruption deals 1 damage to each creature and player for each mountain put into the graveyard in this way.

cards.name: Wall of Air
cards.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: "This 'standing windstorm' can hold us off indefinitely? Ridiculous!" Saying nothing, she put a pinch of salt on the table. With a bang she clapped her hands, and the salt disappeared, blown away.

foreignNames.name: Luftmauer
foreignNames.text: Fliegen

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Wall of Water
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}: Wall of Water gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A deafening roar arose as the fury of an enormous vertical river supplanted our serenity. Eddies turned into whirling geysers, leveling everything in their path.

foreignNames.name: Wasserwand
foreignNames.text: {U}:+1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges

cards.originalText: ooU +1/+0 until end of turn

cards.name: Water Elemental
cards.flavor: Unpredictable as the sea itself, Water Elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.

cards.name: Zephyr Falcon
cards.text: Flying, vigilance
cards.flavor: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.

foreignNames.name: Westwindfalke
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen.
Der Falke wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.

cards.originalText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Zephyr Falcon to tap.

cards.name: Acquire
cards.text: Search target opponent's library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.
cards.flavor: Sometimes "innovation" means "stealing another's secret before anyone else can."

foreignNames.name: Akquirieren
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche die Bibliothek eines Gegners deiner Wahl nach einer Artefaktkarte und bringe diese Karte unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel. Dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Manchmal bedeutet „Innovation", jemandem ein Geheimnis zu stehlen, bevor ein anderer die Möglichkeit dazu hat.

foreignNames.name: Adquirir
foreignNames.text: Busca una carta de artefacto en la biblioteca del oponente objetivo y ponla en juego bajo tu control. Luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: A veces "innovar" significa "robar los secretos de otro antes que nadie".

foreignNames.name: Acquisition
foreignNames.text: Cherchez dans la bibliothèque de l'adversaire ciblé une carte d'artefact et mettez-la en jeu sous votre contrôle. Ce joueur mélange ensuite sa bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Parfois, « innover » signifie « être le premier à voler le secret d'autrui. »

foreignNames.name: Acquisire
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il grimorio di un avversario bersaglio, scegli una carta artefatto e metti in gioco quella carta sotto il tuo controllo. Poi quel giocatore rimescola il proprio grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: A volte "innovazione" significa "rubare i segreti di una persona prima che ci riesca qualcun'altro."

foreignNames.name: 接収
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーのライブラリーからアーティファクト・カードを１枚探し、あなたのコントロール下で場に出す。その後、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 時として「革新」とは、「他人の秘密を誰よりも先に盗むこと」を意味する。

foreignNames.name: Adquirir
foreignNames.text: Procure por um card de artefato no grimório do oponente alvo e coloque-o em jogo sob seu controle. Depois, aquele jogador embaralha seu próprio grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Algumas vezes, "inovar" quer dizer "roubar o segredo de alguém antes que outro o faça".

foreignNames.name: 掌握
foreignNames.text: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，并将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 有时「创新」意指「先一步偷取他人秘密」。

cards.originalText: Search target opponent's library for an artifact card and put that card into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Advanced Hoverguard
cards.text:
Flying
{U}: Advanced Hoverguard gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"They are like their vedalken masters: untouchable, aloof, and omnipresent."
—Bruenna, Neurok leader

foreignNames.name: Vorgerückter Schwebgardist
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{U}: Der Vorgerückte Schwebgardist kann in diesem Zug nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen und Fähigkeiten sein.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie sind wie ihre Vedalken-Gebieter: unantastbar, distanziert und omnipräsent." — Bruenna, Anführerin der Neurok

foreignNames.name: Aeroguarda mejorado
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
{U}: El Aeroguarda mejorado no puede ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Son como sus amos vedalken: intocables, distantes y omnipresentes." —Bruenna, líder néurok

foreignNames.name: Aérogarde de conception avancée
foreignNames.text:
Vol
{U} : L'Aérogarde de conception avancée ne peut pas être la cible de sorts ou de capacités ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ils sont comme leurs maîtres vedalkens, intouchables, distants et omniprésents. » —Bruenna, chef des Neuroks

foreignNames.name: Aerocustode in Avanscoperta
foreignNames.text:
Volare
{U}: L'Aerocustode in Avanscoperta non può essere bersaglio di magie o abilità in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sono come i loro padroni vedalken: intoccabili, distaccati e onnipresenti" —Bruenna, condottiera neuraca

foreignNames.name: 上位の空護り
foreignNames.text:
飛行
{U}：このターン、上位の空護りは呪文や能力の対象にならない。
foreignNames.flavor: まるでヴィダルケンの首領みたいね。触れず、遠くて、どこにでもいるんだから。 ―― ニューロックの指導者ブルエナ

foreignNames.name: Guarda-de-Ronda Avançado
foreignNames.text:
Voar
{U}: Guarda-de-Ronda Avançado não pode ser alvo de mágicas ou habilidades neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eles são como seus mestres vedalkeanos: intocáveis, altivos e onipresentes." —Bruenna, líder dos Neuroques

foreignNames.name: 高等空卫
foreignNames.text:
飞行
{U}：高等空卫本回合不能成为咒语或异能的目标。
foreignNames.flavor: 「冷漠，难以接近，无所不在；一如其维多肯主子。」 ～纽若克统领布威娜

cards.originalText:
Flying
{U}: Advanced Hoverguard can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
